title: Painkiller: Complete Pack – Six Games + All DLCs + Bonus Content
body:
Painkiller: Complete Pack – Six Games + All DLCs + Bonus Content


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, First-person, 3D
Companies: People Can Fly, Mindware Studios, The Farm 51 and others
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI11
Original Size: 40.3 GB
Repack Size: from 3.5 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive, Mega.nz (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by Gamesdrive, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on six Steam releases with all language depots included: 39 GB, thanks to Christsnatcher!
  • Christsnatcher’s cracks applied over original 5 games, SSE by syahmixp applied over H&D
  • Missing Russian text/voice/videos localizations (1.3 GB) added
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of: 5-pack (original games on PainEngine), H&D standalone game, optional videos for 5-pack, bonus content of H&D
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 40.3 to 3.5~11 GB for any single language, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 5-20 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 29.3 GB
  • Read the “Language Switching” below for details on that topic
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Complete Pack Contents:
  • Painkiller: Black Edition, v1.64, inc. Battle Out of Hell Expansion
  • Painkiller: Overdose, v84.4
  • Painkiller: Resurrection, v44
  • Painkiller: Redemption, v1.05f
  • Painkiller: Recurring Evil, v.Final Patch 1
  • Painkiller: Hell & Damnation, Build 20140415_3933 + following DLCs:
  • — City Critters
  • — Collector’s Edition DLC 1
  • — Collector’s Edition DLC 2
  • — Demonic Vacation at the Blood Sea
  • — Digital Extras
  • — DLC Preorder 1
  • — Full Metal Rocket
  • — Halloween DLC
  • — Heaven’s Above
  • — Medieval Horror
  • — Operation “Zombie Bunker”
  • — Satan Claus DLC
  • — The Clock Strikes Meat Night

Painkiller: Black Edition

Painkiller Black Edition includes Painkiller and the expansion pack Battle Out of Hell, featuring 10 additional single-player levels and many new villans.

Gothic Story, Frantic Gameplay. Painkiller is a first-person horror shooter, designed to satisfy a gamer’s hunger for intense, fast-paced action. It’s an adrenaline addict’s nightmare, where hellish monsters swarm in seemingly endless mobs.

Painkiller Hell: Overdose

The critically-acclaimed and award-winning FPS franchise is back! Packed with tons of fast-paced, adrenaline-fueled single player and multiplayer action, Painkiller Overdose brings with it 6 innovative new demonic weapons, mind-bending physics, lightning-player maps, over 40 demented and sickly-twisted monsters from Hell and gigantic end bosses that will blow your mind!

Painkiller Hell: Resurrection

Developed by Homegrown Games with former developers and modders from the previous Painkiller games in collaboration with Studio Med-Art and with a Catholic priest advising, Painkiller Resurrection combines rock-hard, no-frills action and an exciting story with painstakingly researched details. In a bizarre world influenced by medieval ideas about hell and purgatory and Dante’s Inferno, the mixture of fast, straightforward levels and enormous, explorable regions containing the worst scum of any hell provides a unique gaming experience.

Painkiller Hell: Redemption

Welcome to a world of pain. Heaven is once again in danger and threatened by a reckless army of hell spawn monsters – and they will stop at nothing. This time, only two heroes can save heaven from total destruction: Daniel and Belial, two champions from previous Painkiller stories, have to team up and put an end to the conflict in the old epic struggle between heaven and hell. Unfortunately hell’s army is even greater and stronger than before: The new general of the abyss has been endowed with powers of all the previous leaders combined, and she’s determined to see the next war through until hell’s victory. Her legions won’t back down without a long and bloody battle. Can you survive the endless attacks of nightmarish minions and terrifying fiends?

Painkiller Hell: Recurring Evil

Battle never ceases in the realm known as Hell. This time around it’s a battle for the freedom of your very soul. Will you be able to escape from the prison hidden in the darkest deepest chasm of Hell? Do you have enough courage to travel through the most dangerous and twisted areas, infamous for their unsafety, even among demons themselves? Are you prepared to significantly reduce the demonic population?

Once again you have the chance to experience the magnificent dark atmosphere of the good (or evil?) Painkiller, the only true oldschool First Person Shooter, tough as nails, without a trace of remorse, without a glimpse of motion blur or other technological makeup. Just Painkiller and nothing else matters!

Painkiller: Hell & Damnation

Heaven’s Hitman is Back… With a Vengeance

Evil has returned! Demonic powers are manifesting themselves as a myriad of dark creatures, fighting over the fates of imprisoned souls caught in Purgatory.

Once again, it is up to Daniel Garner, in the unenviable position of being the Curse of Darkness and the Toy of Light, to fight his way past hordes of demons and fiends.

Questions remain… “Can he stop the powerful creatures that stand in his way? Will he ever leave the hell of Purgatory and be reunited with his wife Catherine?”

Painkiller Hell & Damnation is a fast-paced, thrilling modern remake of an all-action shooter Classic!

You can skip downloading and installing of 5-pack (original games on PainEngine), H&D standalone game, optional videos for 5-pack, bonus content of H&D. Here is the list of optional files:

  • fg-5games-01.bin (all five bins required if you want to install 5 original games)
  • fg-5games-02.bin
  • fg-5games-03.bin
  • fg-5games-04.bin
  • fg-5games-05.bin
  • fg-5games-optional-russian.bin (will replace voiceovers/videos with Russian in all five games)
  • fg-5games-optional-german.bin (will replace voiceovers/videos with German in all five games)
  • fg-5games-optional-french.bin (will replace voiceovers/videos with French in BE & Resurrection games)
  • fg-5games-optional-spanish.bin (will replace voiceovers/videos with Spanish in BE & Resurrection games)
  • fg-5games-optional-italian.bin (will replace voiceovers/videos with Italian in Resurrection game)
  • fg-5games-optional-videos.bin (Credits, “Making of” and Machinima videos from BE, Overdose and Redemption)
  • fg-hnd-01.bin (all three bins required if you want to install Hell & Damnation)
  • fg-hnd-02.bin
  • fg-hnd-03.bin
  • fg-hnd-optional-bonus.bin (contains H&D bonus content: Artbook, “Making of” videos, Soundtrack in MP3 format and five printable PDFs)

In example, if you want to install five original games with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers and don’t need optional videos – skip all “optional” and files, but download fg-5games-01.bin, fg-5games-02.bin, fg-5games-03.bin, fg-5games-04.bin, fg-5games-05.bin and fg-5games-optional-german.bin along with setup.exe.

By default five original games install with English text/GUI and voiceovers. If you download optional voiceovers for 5-games pack, some (or all) of those will have videos/audio in that language. With some exceptions:

  • If you install 5-pack without optional voiceovers, you can switch all those games to Russian GUI/UI by running “Switch 5 Games to Russian.bat” in the game root
  • If you don’t need Russian, but want to play Black Edition with English voiceovers/videos, copy all files from “Painkiller Black Edition\rus1″to “Painkiller Black Edition” folder and then run “Painkiller Black Edition\!LangTool\XPOR.Tool.exe” to select one of eight GUI languages

Hell & Damnation language can be changed by editing “Painkiller Hell & Damnation\SmartSteamEmu.ini”, language string
